```{callme}
SEXP generate_random(void) {
  
  GetRNGstate();
  Rprintf("C: %.7f\n", unif_rand()); 
  Rprintf("C: %.7f\n", norm_rand()); 
  PutRNGstate();

  return R_NilValue;
}
```

```{r}
set.seed(2024)
runif(1)
rnorm(1)

set.seed(2024)
generate_random()
```
